params.name: -maxruntime
params.description: Maximum running time per molecule (in milliseconds). Use -1 for unlimited.

params.name: -waitingjobs
params.description: Maximum number of jobs to store in queue for worker threads to process. Use -1 to set it to 50*Max threads.

params.name: -threads
params.description: Maximum number of threads to use. Use -1 to use as many threads as the number of cpu cores

params.name: -detectaromaticity
params.description: Remove existing aromaticity information and automatically detect aromaticity in the molecule before calculation of descriptors

params.name: -file
params.description: Set file to save calculated descriptors

params.name: -log
params.description: Create a log file. Name of log file is the name of the descriptors file with a .log extension.

params.name: -maxcpdperfile
params.description: Maximum number of compounds to be stored in each descriptor file. Use 0 for unlimited

params.name: -retain3d
params.description: Retain 3D coordinates when standardizing structure. However, this may prevent some structures from being standardized

params.name: -retainorder
params.description: Retain order of molecules in structural files for descriptor file. This may lead to large memory use if descriptor calculations are stuck at one molecule as the others will not be written to file and cleared from memory

params.name: -usefilenameasmolname
params.description: Use filename (minus the extension) as molecule name
